channel.title: Inspiration, Doing it right
channel.description:
[center] Welcome to our (ExtremeX-Scape™'s and mine), new project,
You're probably thinking, "Oh god another remake?", "Another project insanity leech.. -.-" or something of that general nature,
Think again, Inspiration is a Framework that will be written from scratch by us, it's current feature's include,
[code] Player log in and packet handling, Netty networking. [/code]
some of you may want to know the goals of Inspiration, well as of now they are as follow's:
[b] Complete player log in make server playable in the near future [/b]
[center][u][b][size=12pt]Media[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://i52.tinypic.com/16i8o4h.png[/img][/center]
[center]It is not much as of now, but we will progress as time passes, the thread will also be updated as frequently as possible.[/center]
As some of you know, this is not a 1 man project, but as of now we do not need content developers, when we are in need of assistance, ExtremeX-Scape™ (Ryley) Will post a development team thread, Thank you for reading, check back with us soon.
[/center]

item.title: Inspiration, Doing it right

They probably look at player updating threads etc etc. for some info about runescape.

item.title: Inspiration, Doing it right
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I want to see more users writing their own frameworks, I might work on my own pretty soon. Are you looking at any code to see how it works or completely from your knowledge?

Good luck on this baddy.

Read full topic

item.title: Inspiration, Doing it right
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:6, topic:410417”][quote author=TheCyberMan link=topic=511702.msg3713292#msg3713292 date=1313466763]
This is definitely a big and very unusual project like Project Galaxy. I wish you the best of luck.
[/quote]

I will be working on both, as I am a very fast worker, btw I am still waiting on something to do -.-[/quote]
Take your time, and do it right.

Read full topic

(Yes we live near each other)
